title: AI tool cuts unexpected deaths in hospital by 26%, Canadian study finds
description: A year-and-a-half-long study on Chartwatch, an artificial intelligence system in use at St. Michael's Hospital in Toronto, shows the tool led to a striking 26 per cent drop in the number of unexpected deaths.
